body:

- [ ] Avatar: https://www.figma.com/file/WQZcp6S0EnzxdTL4taoKDv/Design-System-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=8737-153241&mode=dev

`username` component is being used here: https://www.figma.com/file/7KIYbhoqNGAIFonE0w9TDz/Messages-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=7950-519665&mode=design&t=feVK5xLgRS6UvYau-4

> Preferably create individual issues for each component and raise separate PRs.

### Acceptance criteria
- Follow guidelines
- Implement preview screens
- Add component tests
